T02TD2860E:198b-1: sim ha n'a da raksha tsakra n'a ma /
T02TD2860E:198b-3: seng ge sgra'i srung ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02TD2860E:198b-4: 'phags pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2860E:198b-5: thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2860E:198b-6: seng ge sga la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2860E:198b-7: sems can kun gyi nad dad gdon //
T02TD2860E:198b-8: bsrung ba'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2860E:198b-9: dus dang tshes grangs bzang po la //
T02TD2860E:199a-2: lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis //
T02TD2860E:199a-3: ras sam shing lo gro ga la //
T02TD2860E:199a-4: khrag gam rgya skyegs gur gum gyis //
T02TD2860E:199a-5: rim pa ltar ru bskor bar bya //
T02TD2860E:199a-6: dang po padma'i lte ba yin //
T02TD2860E:199a-7: gnyis pa mu khyud phra bar bskor //
T02TD2860E:199a-8: gsum pa chung che pad 'dab brgyad //
T02TD2860E:199a-9: bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2860E:199a-10: padma'i phyir la phra ba bya //
T02TD2860E:199a-11: yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2860E:199a-12: dbus su aom gyi sbyor yig dang //
T02TD2860E:199a-13: de mthar ming dang bsrung tshig bri //
T02TD2860E:199a-14: de yi phyir ri ma mu khyud la //
T02TD2860E:199a-15: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug bri //
T02TD2860E:199a-16: gsum pa pad 'dab brgyad pa la //
T02TD2860E:199a-17: aom spangs yi ge brgyad po bri //
T02TD2860E:199a-18: rim pa bzhi pa'i mu khyud la //
T02TD2860E:199a-19: gzungs sngags bsrung tshig bcas pa bri //
T02TD2860E:199a-20: rim pa lnga pa'i mu khyud la //
T02TD2860E:199a-21: gsal byed sum cu bzhi pa la //
T02TD2860E:199a-22: bsrung bya las sngags ldan pa dgod //
T02TD2860E:199a-23: de ltar bri ba rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2860E:199a-24: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2860E:199a-25: mandal steng du 'khor lo bzhag / mchod dang gtor ma gcig btang ste //
T02TD2860E:199a-26: 'khor lo'i aom yig las spros te //
T02TD2860E:199a-27: rje btsun 'khor lo'i steng du drang //
T02TD2860E:199a-28: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02TD2860E:199a-29: lha mo lnga la mchod pa dang //
T02TD2860E:199a-30: rdzas kyi mchod pa rnam ltas mchod //
T02TD2860E:199a-31: bstod cing bsrung bar gsol pa gdab //
T02TD2860E:199a-32: de gzhu yig 'bru'i rnam par gyur //
T02TD2860E:199a-33: de la byin rlabs bya phyir sngags bzlas pa //
T02TD2860E:199a-34: aom a'a:hr'i:si ha n'a da h'um phat /
T02TD2860E:199a-35: che ge mo sarba ga te raksha ku ru sh'antim pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2860E:199a-42: aam aa: che ge mo la raksha ku ru sh'i ntam ku ru /
T02TD2860E:199a-44: na mo ratna tra ya zhes pa'i gzungs dang /
T02TD2860E:199a-46: zhes pa'i gsal byed la yang ming dang las sngags sbyar te sngags de rnams brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD2860E:199a-47: nyi shu rtsa gcig gam thibs bdun bzlas la gtor ma btang bsrung bar gsol ba gdab /
T02TD2860E:199a-48: de nas dril te gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2860E:199a-49: de yi rjes la bya mi //
T02TD2860E:199a-50: rang gi ye shes bcug gyur nas //
T02TD2860E:199a-51: mchod de bzod gsol gshegs par bya //
T02TD2860E:199a-52: rang la byed dam gzhan la'ang //
T02TD2860E:199a-53: bsrung ba btags pa'i phan yon ni //
T02TD2860E:199a-54: tshe ring bsod nams che ba dang //
T02TD2860E:199b-0: sdig pa thams cad byang ba @199b dang //
T02TD2860E:199b-2: rje btsun srung 'khor byas pa yis //
T02TD2860E:199b-3: dge des sems can bar cha de zhi //
T02TD2860E:199b-4: rje btsun seng ge sgra'i srung 'khor bla ma'i zhal nas 'ongs pa rdzogs so //
